page1.an-how-long: The longer you store, the more you save. You're currently benefitting from a 25% off.
page2.an-would-packing: We’ll send you enough to pack everything you want to store.
page3.qu-where-collect: Tell us where to collect your stuff from
page3.an-where-collect: Please enter your contact information here. Our movers will contact you via WhatsApp or phone call before coming, so please make sure your mobile is always on, and meet the mover at the reception point of the given address.
page4.an-account-info: To provide your personal info that you use in ubox services, like your customer identity or your building supplementary information.
page4.qu-are-you-student: Are you a University / Higher Education Student?
page4.qu-close-contact: Have you been in close contact with someone who is on Mandatory Home Quarantine from the Centre For Health Protection, or have been issued one?
page4.qu-covid19: If Yes, ‘contact less” delivery with items to be placed outside the door, while pick-up appointments should only be scheduled after the quarantine period. In addition, we are unable to complete appointments at buildings with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.
page5.an-which-payment: Please select your preferred payment method.
page6.no-paragraph1: Thank you very much for your purchase. Your order number is {{order}} and confirmation email is sent to {{email}}
cart.no-cancel-notice: FREE to cancel or amend your order if you let us know before 11am one working days prior to your collection or delivery.
cart.wd-delivery-fee: Delivery fees are charged when you order your stuff back, find
cart.wd-delivery-floor-fee: Single item delivered locally to ground floor HK$29 + HK$29/items (min charge is 3 boxes/items or $116)
customer_extend.an-how-long: The longer you store, the more you save.
customer-retrieval.an-do-you-retrieve-fr: Do you want to choose a group retrieval day?
customer-retrieval.an-are-you-sameday: Are you same day return empty boxes?
customer-retrieval.an-need-walkup: Does your live place need to walk up?
customer-retrieval.an-want-all-items: Do you want to return all items?
customer-retrieval.an-which-item-retriev: Which item (QR Code) do you want to retrieval?
customer-retrieval.wd-minmum-retrieval-f: (Minmum ${{fee}} of retrieval delivery fee is applied)
customer-retrieval.no-paragraph1: Thank you very much for your purchase. Your retrieval order number is {{order}} and confirmation email is sent to {{email}}
common.wd-promo-validate: The promotional code you entered is invalid. Please try again.
common.wd-tentative-retrieval-note: Please note that the tentative retrieval date provided is an estimated timeframe and not a guaranteed delivery date. To request a retrieval service, kindly click on the Retrieval Now button below.
common.wd-checkout-note: For a successful payment process while using WeChat Pay & Alipay, you have to disable any pop-up blockers on your browser beforehand. This will  allow you to be redirected to the payment page, where you can scan the QR code for payment.
common.no-signup-failed: The email address you have provided is already in use.
common.no-input-name-length: Length of Name must be less than 100 letters
common.no-input-email-length: Length of Email must be less than 100 letters
common.no-input-contact-validate: Contact must be number and the length must be between 8 and 11 letters.
common.no-input-backupContact-validate: Backup contact must be number and the length must be between 8 and 11 letters.
common.no-input-mobile: Please input the backup contact number
common.no-input-mobile-validate: Backup contact number must be number and the length must be between 8 and 11 letters.
common.no-input-address-length: Address must be less than 250 letters
common.no-input-password-length: Length of Password must be between 8 and 16 letters
common.no-input-studentID-validate: Length of Student ID msut be less than 50 letters
common.no-input-wechatID-validate: Length of Wechat ID must be less than 50 letters
oder-detail.no-title: Order {{order}} was placed on {{date}} and is currently {{orderState}}.
customer-extend.no-title: Order {{order}} storage expiry date is on {{date}} and current monthly fee is ${{monthlyFee}}.
customer-retrieval.no-title: Order {{order}} storage expiry date is on {{date}}.
customer-retrieval.an-when-retrieval: When do you want to retrieve your items?
common.wd-current-password: Current password (leave blank to leave unchange)
common.wd-new-password: New password (leave blank to leave unchange)
common.no-forgot-password-email-msg: Enter the email you use for ubox, and we’ll help you create a new password.
common.no-forgot-password-code-msg: We sent a security code to ***{{emailLetter}}**.com. You may need to check your Junk or Spam folder
common.no-pay-outstanding-fee: You have an outstanding payment that needs to be settled before you can place a retrieval order.
